lead_paragraph: A 16-year-old high school football player in West Caldwell, N.J., collapsed at practice yesterday afternoon and later died, the police said. The Caldwell High School player, who was not identified, caught a pass and was tackled. He got up and started walking toward the bench, but collapsed. A team doctor rushed to the player’s aid and detected a pulse and that he was breathing, but the player went into cardiac arrest a short time later and died at Mountainside Hospital in Glen Ridge.
